title: Make the Bing Vision lens of the camera app pinnable to Start in WP 8.1 and/or add it to the Cortana page
body: Make Bing Vision lens in the camera app pinnable to Start for quick access again and/or add it to the Cortana screen, to the left of the Music Search button perhaps.

comments.body: This will make photo searches and scanning QR codes much faster and more convenient again. Please make this happen!!!
